dialogues.title: Agents Of Change:
dialogues.subtitle: Role Of Writers As Social Commentators And Activists
dialogues.paragraph: A discussion on how Indian writers tackle caste, gender, and social justice through fiction, poetry, and essays. Authors will share their experiences of how they use literature to drive activism and advocate for civilisational and environmental causes.

dialogues.title: Unveiling the Past:
dialogues.subtitle: The Craft and Challenges of Indian History Writing
dialogues.paragraph: A discussion on historiography, contested narratives, and Indic traditions in shaping historical discourse. Panellists explore nationalistic history writing, indigenous contributions, and the balance between cultural heritage and modern research.

dialogues.title: Innovation and Aspiration:
dialogues.subtitle: The Start-Up Revolution in India
dialogues.paragraph: A deep dive into the success stories, challenges, and future of India’s start-up ecosystem—covering funding, scaling, and regulatory hurdles

dialogues.title: Changemakers Unplugged:
dialogues.subtitle: Social Entrepreneurship Stories
dialogues.paragraph: A conversation with social entrepreneurs driving change through initiatives in poverty alleviation, education, and clean energy aligned with India’s developmental goals.

dialogues.title: Sowing Solutions:
dialogues.subtitle: Reforming India’s Agricultural Landscape
dialogues.paragraph: Exploring sustainable farming, indigenous practices, and policy reforms to ensure food security while preserving traditional agricultural wisdom

dialogues.title: Odisha 2036:
dialogues.subtitle: A vision for tomorrow
dialogues.paragraph: A discussion on Odisha’s growth trajectory, focusing on infrastructure, economy, social development, and governance as it nears its centenary.

dialogues.title: Voices of Her:
dialogues.subtitle: Women in Indian Literary Tradition
dialogues.paragraph: Tracing the evolution of female voices in Indian literature—from bhakti poets to modern writers—this session explores gender, identity, and empowerment, highlighting Shakta-inspired narratives and their impact on storytelling

paralellDialogues.title: Purvodaya:
paralellDialogues.subtitle: Role of Odisha and Odias
paralellDialogues.paragraph: Odisha stands at the crossroads of culture and progress from ancient heritage to modern industry. This session uncovers the state's enduring influence on India's artistic, spiritual, and economic fabric while spotlighting its rising role in tourism, renewable energy, and industrial growth. With the Purvodaya initiative paving the way for Eastern India's transformation, panellists will explore how Odisha's rich resources and resilient people are shaping the nation's future.

paralellDialogues.title: Ink & Identity:
paralellDialogues.subtitle: A Literary and Social Perspective on Odisha
paralellDialogues.paragraph: A discussion on how Indian writers tackle caste, gender, and social justice through fiction, poetry, and essays. Authors will share their experiences of how they use literature to drive activism and advocate for civilisational and environmental causes.

paralellDialogues.paragraph: A discussion on how Indian writers tackle caste, gender, and social justice through fiction, poetry, and essays. Authors will share their experiences of how they use literature to drive activism and advocate for civilisational and environmental causes.
